We conduct semi-structured interview soldier , Buddies , National Guard leadership develop pilot test survey item relevant implementation . Further , develop pretest survey item relevant determine soldier symptomatic functional status . We also conduct small feasibility study , field newly develop survey representative sample recently return National Guard member Michigan Indiana , determine response rate veteran willingness allow access linkable PDHA/PDHRA data health service data . Finally , construct merge , de-identified longitudinal dataset comprise Post-Deployment Health Assessment Reassessment data , Military Health System/TRICARE , VA service data National Guard soldier Michigan comparison state Indiana Ohio . DOC.detailed_description: Background : Soldiers return Operation Iraqi Freedom ( OIF ) Operation Enduring Freedom ( OEF ) commonly experience symptom PTSD , depressive disorder , interpersonal difficulty . Forty-two percent National Guard ( NG ) soldier report symptom suggest need evaluation . Unfortunately , half mental health need initiate treatment VA elsewhere . Stigma remain important barrier . Proactive peer outreach may successfully address stigma facilitate appropriate treatment use . In recently implement Michigan Guard Buddy*to*Buddy ( B2B ) program , return MIARNG soldier assign first-tier `` Buddy '' unit systematically telephone `` check '' regard key area function symptom . Soldiers may also refer second-tier Buddies , veteran outside Guard train motivational interviewing supervise professional staff . The goal program identify soldier need evaluation connect care timely fashion . We conduct preliminary work allow u assess need feasibility add rigorous evaluation/research component B2B program . Objectives : The goal RRP ass need AND feasibility large VA study would use strong quasi-experimental design ( time series analysis comparison group ) examine impact B2B program return NG veteran mental health treatment initiation , retention , symptom , functional outcome . Specific RRP aim : 1 . Prepare initiate formative evaluation Buddy*to*Buddy program Michigan Army National Guard ( MI ARNG ) . 2 . Develop determine feasibility confidential survey National Guard veterans Michigan Indiana elicit information regard B2B process ( MI ARNG ) , VA outreach process , mental health symptom , substance use , treatment initiation retention . 3 . Construct de-identified link dataset consist PDHA/PDHRA data , Military Treatment Facility/TRICARE service provider use , VA service use MI ARNG NG soldier contiguous state Indiana Ohio . Conduct preliminary analysis data . Methods : Preliminary work complete two area . We begin formative evaluation implementation B2B program , use augmented qualitative RE-AIM Plus framework , multiple data source data collection technique , conduct field observation interview program stakeholder . Personnel level , include NG leadership , Buddies , soldier , part process . We also develop refine survey item relevant understanding B2B implementation soldier symptom functional status . We test procedure field survey Michigan comparison state , assess response rate , use data inform design large study soldier outcome .
DOC.criteria: Returning MI ARNG member participate BuddytoBuddy program
